comments:
1. Create a Table, set it name "Table A" and set a dataset "Dataset" to it.
2. Ceeate another Table "Table B", Select it and select "Edit Data Binding" popup menuitem.
3. In the "Data Binding Dialog", select ReportItem radio button and select "Table A".
4. Cancel the dialog, the console will print exception trace.
